Name: Encounter: Blood Games
Description:
If an encounter card asks you to choose one effect, you must choose an option you can fully complete and you must choose without any input from your partner.
After you play an action that discards one or more cards from the encounter deck, choose one:
• Draw an event discarded this way.
• Persist each card discarded this way.

Name: Your Gracious Host
Description:
After an enemy attacks, choose one:
• Remove all damage from that enemy. At least one damage must be removed to be able to choose this option.
• That enemy escalates.

Name: Neverending Torment
Description: If an encounter card would be discarded from the field, it persists instead.

Name: Double Jeopardy
Description: If an encounter card asks you to choose one effect, choose each effect of that encounter card instead.

Name: Harrowing Experience
Description:
After you draw this duration, it escalates.
After you draw an event, choose one:
• That event persists and escalates. That event must not already be persisting or escalating to choose this option.
• Lose 2 vitality.

Name: Now or Later
Description:
Choose one: 
• Discard each hero card on the field. At least one hero card must be on the field to choose this option.
• Discard a hero card from your hand and this event persists.

Name: Friend or Foe
Description:
Choose one: 
• Your partner discards each hero card in their hand. They must have at least one hero card in their hand to choose this option.
• Seek Your Gracious Host from the top of the encounter deck or the top of the discard pile and draw it. If you can't, this event escalates.

Name: Life or Limb
Description:
Choose one: 
• Discard each hero card in your hand. You must have at least one hero card in your hand to choose this option.
• Lose 4 vitality.

Name: Unwilling Participant
Description: As this enemy leaves the field, lose 4 vitality.
